message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,500. I think it would be a valuable addition for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $11,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, would you be willing to go down to $10,750?
